alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:22PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Laramie County through 300 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Natural Fort, or 10 miles southwest of Cheyenne, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Greeley. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
